name: TrapClouds!
description:
Hello ^^

Im a french videogames fan and this is my 1st VideoGame. I don't have any kind  of formation so try to be kind with me. I accept all constructive comments.

This game is a "die and reatry " game so u have to know u will die a lot. So please, try to dont be frustrated ;)

I hope ill succed to make my project grow. If ur interested about the developement, u can folow my facebook page 

at : https://www.facebook.com/DessinLucasPerrin/?ref=bookmarks

Enjoy ;p
